casebody.data:
DICESARE, et al.
v.
The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY 156P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Russ Ferguson, III, James P. Cooney, III, Mark J. Horoschak, Brian Allen Hayles, Sarah Motley Stone, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authoirty, d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System. Reynolds Michael Elliot, Attorney at Law, for DiCesare, Christopher, et al. Linwood Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Hospital Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of May 2017 by North Carolina Hospital Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
